note.p: Acquaintance of CD’s. Resided at Adderly Hall, Adderly near Market Drayton, Shropshire, afterwards at Headington Hill, Oxford.
Post Office directory of Gloucestershire, with Bath, Bristol, Herefordshire, and Shropshire 1863
